tool_description: lits.rocks is an API for URL shortening. Free to use, No advertising No registration. All shortened links are available for lifetime. Shorten your URLs now... Because small links are cool.

api_list.name: CREATE SHORT URL
api_list.description: Creates a short URL from a long URL provided by the user.

api_list.name: GET ALL URLs
api_list.description: Retrieves all URLs shortened by the API, including the original long URL, the unique ID created by the API, and the shortened URL.
